EmailTemplate.name: June Emails 2018.PCF 2.2 - 6-5-18
EmailTemplate.subject: 6/27 Webinar: Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.2: Accelerating Development
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join us for the webinar Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.2: Accelerating Development <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jun-27-pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-2-accelerating-development-webinar?utm_source=digest&utm_medium=webinars&utm_campaign=pcf-2.2&utm_term=q218]]>, on June 27, 2018.
During this webinar, we'll discuss the new capabilities in Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.2. Hear about the latest updates to PAS, PAS for Windows, and PKS. Plus, we'll also showcase new features for Operations Manager, CredHub, and PCF Healthwatch.
Presenters: Pieter Humphrey, Principal Product Marketing Manager, Pivotal Jared Ruckle, Principal Product Marketing Manager, Pivotal Sameer Advani, Staff Product Manager, Pivotal
Date: Wednesday, June 27, 2018 Time: 10:00am PDT / 1:00pm EDT
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jun-27-pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-2-accelerating-development-webinar?utm_source=digest&utm_medium=webinars&utm_campaign=pcf-2.2&utm_term=q218]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=875+Howard+Street&entry=gmail&source=g]]>, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://info.pivotal.io/c000200I0NAU0rCJC001O00]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://info.pivotal.io/TDAIO000r0000U220N00CJ0]]>.
